tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I so wanted to write the feedback about Dr.Madhulika Bhattacharya and even though I am busy coping up with my newborn I couldn’t control writing about this kind ,genuine, honest doctor. She has such a positive aura around her which I felt every day I visited her and her smile comforts you that everything is going to be fine. Unlike other big doctors, she will be available 24/7 on text messages and wtsapp in case you have any issues ,you can reach out to her and she is very prompt in her response .I was lucky to have chosen her for my pregnancy and I can say it was my bestest decision. I fall short of words telling about her but definitely I suggest all the pregnant women to consult Dr. Madhulika to make their pregnancy a beautiful experience!!My birth story goes like this-
I was admitted on 19th March and had pains whole night and in the morning while I was not able to take the pain around 9 am we called the doctor and requested her for C-section but  she completely denied that and kept motivating me instead for normal delivery  even though me and my husband begged her so much. She was firm that I will be able to deliver normal in 30 to 45 minutes and the same happened. Even if I say 1000 times thanks to her also it is less. I will always be very very grateful to her and she is the most amazing gynecologist I have ever met!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It was indeed a 'blessing' to have met Dr. Modhulika Bhattacharya ,she made the whole process of my wife's delivery absolutely smooth, seamless and flawless . She was always responsive and supportive throughout the pre and post pregnancy period *** *** *********** *** *** ** *** ** *** **** ******* ** ********* *** ******* ** *** ******* .Her friendly nature and attention to every minute detail was really admirable .She always patiently listened to all the patient doubts /issues and recommended absolutely fantastic solutions . 

Our Baby was delivered successfully on the 18th of Aug 2021 and Dr Modhulika played the key role in ensuring the whole procedure is best in class and both Mom and Baby are doing absolutely fine so I'd like to extend our sincere gratitude and Thanks to Dr. Modhulika for all the medical support and care she and her Team provided .We're overwhelmed and Glad such a wonderful doctor is present amongst us and we wish Dr. Modhulika the best this world has to offer , Thanks a Ton Doctor for all your help, support and care .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We were attended by Dr. Modhulika Bhattacharya this morning for my wife's regular checkup. She comes across as someone with a very pleasent demeanor and is very assuring. From the moment we stepped into the room to the moment we left we felt we were being guided by someone who really understood the anxiety of a person new to motherhood and advised us appropriately and much to our hearts desire. Furthermore, she advised dietary means rather than taking artificial supplements. Was a wondeful interaction and experience. Would recommend the doctor for sure.

tags: None
review:
I consulted Dr Modhulika for my second pregnancy. We were looking out for a Gynaecologist with whom we can get fairly easy appointment without wairing for days. 
As expected, Dr Modhulika was always available, whenever we wanted. She had listened to all our queries and concerns with  patience and had clear and satisfying answers for each. She was swift in replying to my email queries as well, which was very helpful. 
The doctor was keen in making the delivery a natural birth, even if it meant overdue by a few days as long as the baby's health remained fine. The delivery was normal as wished for and during the labour the doctor was with me throughout, providing all support. Overall we had a very good experience with the doctor and would definitely recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: Dr Madhulika gets up from her seat before the patient does. She has 2 rooms adjacent to each other and keeps moving between the two just to save time between one patient leaving and the other entering! No mother can really discuss all concerns with a doctor with this kind pressure. No feeling of connection with the doctor on this journey.

tags: None
review: Not a connecting experience that every mother looks for during her 1st pregnancy. She is not that friendly as well

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We had an amazing experience with Dr Modhulika. We found her very straight forward , providing us the perfect guidance and medical advice at various stages.

Best thing is that she made pregnancy feel extremely normal with no unnecessary hype/ fear. The experience during labor was especially commendable.  She helped strive for a normal delivery- though I had to be induced and eventually ended in a csection... Doctor made every attempt to deliver normally . An example was during the labor- the duty doctor checked and found miconium in the amniotic fluid and hinted that we will need an emergency c-section and called Doctor Modhulika - she calmly asked to wait and keep monitoring baby vitals. 

Another thing about her is that she is always positive, calm and one always comes out happy post consultation. Would definitely recommend her to everyone who are expecting ..

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Modhulika is very efficient and expert in treating her patients.

I had severe stomach pain and I had to undergo surgery.  I was unable to walk and talk due to heavy bleeding. I was very weak too.

Dr Modhulika handles it very efficiently and did the surgery. 
I started walking and taking right after surgery like nothing has happened to me. 

I would like to thanks Dr Modhulika for the treatment and proper suggestion.

I used to always bother her by asking her suggestion for small issue over sms and email. She is very proactive and respond each time we seek her advice. 

I would highly recommend her to any Gynae issue.  She asks for scan only if very much required. She is very friendly and discuss issues with ease with patient.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: Do not go to this doctor and hospital. They hardly care for any patient after discharge. One such case with my sister. Dr Madhulika left the room just after C-section all leaving to nurses and attendees. Patient had complained about abdominal pain and severe fever after the delivery* ** ***** ** **** ****** *** ****** ****** ** ********** *** ******* *** without further investigating quite ignorantly advised to check with physician. Patient was taken to a different hospital. Through scan it was identified there's a perforation in her lower abdomen there by causing severe infection. ***** *** ** *** ************ ** *** ****** *** ****** ** ****** **** ** ** ****. We are so disappointed and helpless. Don't go to this hospital. Its just waste of money, time. We have completely lost faith.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Modhulika Bhattacharya is a wonderful doctor. We have contacted her for my pregnancy and she made the entire journey very pleasant and enjoyable for me. She is approachable, listened all our queries patiently and answered them, explained all the changes in the body I can expect, which made me extremely comfortable. We have asked queries even on whatsapp and she is very prompt to answer them. You can completely depend on her with your pregnancy. She is available on weekends as well which helped us a lot to make appointments in our suitable time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Modhulika Madam is very friendly and always with positive attitude. We had a very good experience with her in my two pregnancies. She always made us feel comfortable and hence could ask our doubts at ease. Madam gave  good support and advice throughout the pregnancy. She would immediately respond to the queries regarding health issues through emails.  Doctors experience and knowledge makes her unique and helps her to proceed with correct medical decisions at every stage of pregnancy.Thank you so much Madam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Labor and Delivery,
review:
It was in my 6th month of pregnancy that I visited Dr. In a place like Bangalore I was worried to find a good doc and hospital for pregnancy as there are hundreds of doc everywhere. We chose dr and from the first visit she has continuously been supportive, patient, non judgemental and approachable. Extremely happy to have chosen her for my delivery. 
She delivered my baby boy through csect (dilation wasn't enough and water had already broken) although she will push u for normal delivery unlike other doctors. In the OT i kinda panicked seeing all the surgical instruments, dr held my hand and struck a conversation calmed me down, gave me words of encouragement. The other docs explain and prepared me mentally telling me what I will feel while inserting syringes etc.
She made my first pregnancy a very memorable one and I definitely recommend her.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy Tests,Pregnancy Scan,Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,
review:
Dr Modhulika is a very positive person and instills a lot of confidence in her patients.

I first consulted her (in Cloudnine) for pre-pregnancy counselling since I was above 35 and it is termed as high risk pregnancy. When I shared my age related worry, she told me 35 is normal these days since women are career oriented and like to embrace motherhood in 30s.  Also that it is not a magical number post which our health starts declining and problems suddenly crop up, it is more a factor of overall fitness and lifestyle. I felt a lot more confident hearing this and she also suggested taking some tests and scans before planning which I did. 

I would prepare lots of questions before every consultation and she would patiently answer them. She was always available on mails for any additional questions/ concerns or advise. Throughout my pregnancy she gave me a lot of positive vibes. While discussing my delivery options, she clearly laid out the pros and cons keeping my medical history in mind, let us decide and supported our decision. 

I was very nervous on the delivery table but when I saw Dr. Modhulika and her ever smiling and confident face, I felt comfortable that I was in great hands. I delivered a healthy baby boy and thanks to Dr. Modhulika for a wonderful experience overall. 

I highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: First time I consulted Dr. Modhulika madam for pregnancy but I was diagnosed with PCOD and Thyroid . I was very much scared of whether I can get pregnant with PCOD or not that time Dr. Modhulika madam guided me, she explained me what PCOD is and it is possible to get pregnant with this problem. She suggested me to lose weight, within 6 months I got pregnant and whole journey of pregnancy she guided me so well and we trusted her 100 percent and as a result I delivered normally a healthy baby boy. One more thing I need to share that my EDD was 30 july but I delivered after 30th july. Dr. Modhulika told me to wait for some days 3 to 4 days more and 2nd was told she will go for induce pain. 2nd only my water got break naturally and pain started naturally without inducing pain . I got admitted same day at night that time Dr. Modhulika was left for the day but she kept tracking what was happening with team.I was in very much pain and every hour Dr. was checking me. House keeping stuffs and sisters also so good they cleaned each stuffs every hour. I was in pain near about 18 hours and Dr. Modhulika and her team did not gave up for normal delivery, they tried till last and finally it happened. I really want to say Thanks to my Dr. madam and her team and all the member of Cloud Nine who supported through out this journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review:
*** ***  *** ********* *** **** ********* *** ** *** ******* *** *** ******** ** **** ** ****** *** ** ******** *** *** *** *** ******** ** ******* **** ** **** ********* ******** *** ******** ****** **** ***.

I my 8 month pregnancy, due to lots of pain my husband said I am paying doctor charges in between you go directly to doctor bcoz no patients were there. But that doctor not understood my pain and said " bring your receipt first "

Not value of patient if you not pay ****** **** ***** *** **** ***** ***** ** *** *** *** ********

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: Dr. Modhulika is the most sensible and non-judgmental doctor I have ever been to. She is smart, understanding and does not spend time in unnecessary small talk. She explains the problem to the patient without being condescending and that is the most important thing for a doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have had a wonderful experience with Dr Modhulika.She had delivered my son last year. She is very approachable and an extremely friendly person. Explains everything in detail and takes great care of her patients. Love the fact that she is just a sms away and her prompt reply to the smallest of things is highly appreciated.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I was very tensed about my first pregnancy ..firstly doctors advised me to terminate the baby due to some complications..but after visiting cloud nine and consulting Dr Malodhulika Bhattacharuya I was relaxed. She explained in detail about my health issue and gave the positive result..am very happy with my results* *** ** ***  **** ****** ** ******* *** **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr Modhulika is extremely positive and makes me Feel positive about the entire Pregnancy Experience. I am happy to have her as my Doc and would definitely recommend to all. She is extremely proactive and responds on emergency queries, which is highly appreciated, as We do understand she must be extremely busy. Overall my Husband and I are extremely comfortable and fortunate to have known Dr Modhulika.Thanks for all your patience and support Doctor .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I would like to express my views for Dr. Modhulika Bhattacharya and would highly recommend her.She is expert in her advice always explains everything in detail so that the person query is well satisfied..My journey with doctor is amazing..with ups and down in 8th month but it was handled amazingly with proper care and attention..And finally i delivered a baby girl which made our life complete.May god bless you doctor with a beautiful smile on your face..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Value for money,
review: She is awesome, She take care every points of pregnancy. She use to give sufficient time to us, Also many suggestion and right thinking info got from Doctor. We are following her last 4 years. Now it is time for 2nd baby in her inspection. When we talk to her, we feel we are in very safe hand* *** ** *** *** *** Regards Chandan & Poonam

tags: None
review: She is very good in comparison to other doctors that we took appointments in other hospitals. The way she speaks with her patients makes them feel as if there is no problem at all....thank you Cloudnine for having such good doctors and I personally thank Dr. Modhulika for my wife's consultation and the good advices that we got from you.

tags: None
review:
It was a very friendly experience with DR.Modhulika. She helped me in very better way for my problem... She was very co-operative and she took the issue very calmly.. She gave me a very simple assurance for my problem and so now I am having no tension for my issue.. 
Thanks Doctor..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: A little strict but it is for the good. She takes care of each and every details, explains each and every problem and give proper solution to it. At any point of time she will not let your moral come down and keep the mother stress free. Thanks a lot ma'am you were a support system for the whole journey and I am really sorry if at any point of time I have disappointed you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Modhulika is an exceptionally confident physician who transmits her positivity to the patient and family. Mine was a high risk pregnancy after a miscarriage. But the entire 9 months of pregnancy I knew I was in safe hands. 
I am extremely privileged to have had my first baby under her supervision. 
If ever there is a risk or something untoward she ensures that one is medically aware and psychologically prepared to take what might ensue.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had great experience with Doc Modhulika.. Throughout my pregnancy she was very supportive and was always very helpful at times when I had to ask her something related to any health issue she replied immediately on what’s app.  I remember how much I was scared for csection but doctor holded  my hand and she said don’t worry u wll be alright. And yes I had my baby boy there .. I would recommend Dr Modhulika for pregnancy care..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Scan,
review: I have been consulting Dr. Modhulika for my last 2 pregnancies and i'm completely satisfied with her counselling, treatment, pre and post delivery do's & dont and the overall delivery experience. I will recommend Dr. Modhulika if you are planning pregnancy

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
She takes time and explains then patients and very friendly 
We feel we r in safe hands and she answers all our queries patiently 
She understands our issues and also answers on WhatsApp if we need to ask any small queries 
Keep up the good work clowning for havin such a good doctor

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Yes, the doctor was nice and she explained the issue well. BUT ! I donot think I would personally recommend anyone for Cloud9 as a hospital in general for the simplest reason that I believe they fail at professionalism which they try to portray through various calls and sms-es etc. It is so because after their repeated calls (almost to the level of irritation) to reach for the appointment on time, when I reached at sharp 11:15am for a 11:20am appointment, I had to still wait for 1hrs 30mins for my turn to visit the doctor ! A 5-10mins wait, or even 15mins for that matter it understood, but 1.5hrs !!! Utter disappointment in this regard.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I ll advice not to take appointment of any doctor in Cloudnine. I have experienced it multiple times that they ask patients to wait for more than an hour giving reason that doctor is in an emergency. 
Even after out consultation, doctor had to insert coper T and she asked us to get 1 from medical shop. After getting it they asked us to wait for 10mins and then after getting frustrated we stood outside her gate and after following up for another 15mins, she finally helped us out
Service is very poor and doctor doesn't respect one or feelings of the patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: A first blessed parent, who first visited to confirm the pregnancy. "the fist impression is best impression" has turned real here. The Doctor is so positive and supportive that the aspiring parents should always feel rejoice with the developments within. Her 18 yrs of experience are not just the count, it's experience of "wor s t, bad and good" situations. She pined the right treatment at right time to come over to bad situation. As everybody plans to have normal delivery, we also planed and shared with Dr Modhulika. She waits till the last moment until she recognises any critical situation. Fortunalty we never faced any ccomplications thx to God. Dr Charisma, her assistance at night in labour room, has helped us alot along with 3 supporting nurses. And we delivered a healthy baby normally ! it was great to visiting her. I would recommend to visit Cloud 9 old airport road Bangalore, I am sure they have more gems to help us. all the best.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I guess Maternity and Delivery which gives us a rebirth altogether would really go through tough cycles. And the only thing which keeps that going would be the confidence which doctors put on you and ultimately the trust which Doctors gain from their patients. I still remember the confidence Dr. Modulika gave me in the delivery room and I am sure that made me Strong enough there. I would really advice her for everyone as everything went well so smooth in my 9 months of pregnancy,delivery and post delivery care.  She has got a real power which can make anything simple.
My Son is now 3.5 yrs old :)

review: My due was on 23/7/19, before I was showing in some other hospital, later on as the date came nearby I was too scared and I was not satisfied with the doctor so I changed my hosp and I came to Dr. Madhulika she was awesome such a kind and nice person. I visited her on 13th July she was so encouraging during my labor till my baby born and I delivered baby before a say of my due.. she was so gud and nice human being.. Thank you so much doctor ...

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I can't stop myself from writing a review about dr Modhulika. She always carry a smile on her face , motivating , calm and cool person. She will say a big NO to C section unless or until it demands due to medical conditions. I had a very peaceful experience with her and cloudnine OAR. Highly recommended

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: She is good. Went to see her because we are trying to conceive for an year now. She explained the situations and ordered us to get some tests done and called us for follow up. Follow up fee was half the consultation fee, we went to see her on the 6th day after consultation. She prescribed some medications.    I am just hoping for the best. Hope it works out.

tags: None
review: The doctor is extremely friendly,non judgemental and patiently answers all your questions. She thoroughly asked questions to make sure unnecessary tests weren't prescribed. I totally recommend her for any young persons (especially if they're sexually active and seek advice accordingly), and otherwise. Thank you doc!

tags: None
review:
Very expensive.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I had a very good experience with her in my both pregnancies. Very friendly doctor with full of positive vibes.I had my second delivery at 3:45am, still at that time she came with a smiling face and full of energy she made me so comfortable . I would say she is a wonderful doctor. I consulted her for two of my pregnancy and never thought of any other doctor as I was so much satisfied with her treatment. Her knowledge and treatment is perfect .

Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is very patienceful and listen to your problems very calmly. I just visited her with my diagnosis reports which I took in other lab not in C9 labs but she still DID NOT force me me to do the scan again from C9 and gave the right treatment. Not to mention she is very friendly and you can keep on listening to her. I always felt motivated after meeting her. Afer treatment, she always motivated and  at the time of pregnancy too. A very recommended doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: At 6 week it self she identified that I had GDM. Which means I was having high blood sugar problem and that has to be taken care very carefully. She did it very very nicely. Even though I had high blood sugar problem she did my normal dilivery and I am blessed with baby girl. I am very thankful to her. The most beautiful thing about her is she is very friendly and very positive.

Madhulika madam is so nice and she is very friendly . I highly recommend  Madhulika madam.
My Wife Annapurna had  lot of doubts and mam takes time and explains everything with lot of patience.We feel very comfortable with madhulika madam. Just relax and She take cares everything .. 
May God bless you mam. Big big thanks for your support and keep smiling.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Labor and Delivery,
review: I consulted Dr. Modhulika from the very 1st time that I got to know that I was pregnant. She has played a very vital role through these 9 months, she helped us understand the reason behind every test/ check-up and guided us on parameters to be taken care of. To everyone I know, I have been mentioning that I have a very chilled out doctor, and that's the way I'd still go, she easily eliminates what isn't important and helps you throughout. I'm very thankful to Cloud 9 and the entire team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Madhulika madam is so nice and very friendly I feel very comfortable with madhulika madam.pateint need strength and positive vibration from Doctor medicine is not so important for pateint to recover Dr Madhulika madam is so cool and make her patient cool . She not give lots of medicine but she give lots of positive energy and strength and pateint recover so soon she explain the root cause of the problem .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was consulting dr Modhulika from the very first day of my pregnancy. She was very much helping and caring. She has given me a lot of support and courage to go with a normal delivery. Thanks to her and almighty God that i am blessed with a healthy baby and good post delivery health. *** ** *** ** *** **** *** * **** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My search for a renowned OB-GYN took me to Cloudnine. During my initial trip for consultation, I was more or less clear in my mind that this would be the hospital I will deliver my baby. First, it was their infrastructure that amazed me, and then it was the gynecologist that blew my mind away. She was very experienced and used her knowledge to understand my concerns and pacified me to believe everything will go through smoothly. I am very happy I went to Cloudnine.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: The most important thing that you look for in a doctor while expecting your first baby is the way they speak to you.Dr. Modhulika is one of the more confident and pleasant doctors we have met. She put us at ease right from the first visit. She gives you the confidence and ensures the mom to be is happy. Everything else she will take care of.What more could one ask for?
